msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch 'unlabeled-1.5.2'.

author: balld
msg: PR:
Obtained from:
Submitted by:
Reviewed by:
Changed class so that it contains a Properties object, not extends Properties.
This is so that it's easier to write a subclass of Configurations for graceful
upgrading to an XML conf file. I didn't want to have to worry about providing
wrapper methods for everything in Properties, just everything in
Configurations. Everything still works fine with cocoon's classes, but this
_might_ break 3rd party modules that use Properties method calls on their
Configurations objects that aren't replicated in the new plain jane
Configurations object. Please email me if you have such a module and we'll
rethink this.

author: rubys
msg: Change the name of the projectx-tr2.jar to xml.jar, and add comments
indicating that people should not try the latest milestone build
for now.

author: stefano
msg: fixed validation support. Before it didn't work because we didn't set
the error handler and nobody was catching the error events.
NOTE: since stylesheet validation is a pain in the ass, it's turned off.

author: stefano
msg: patched
